messages.message: You are a cell in the deep ocean
Use the arrow keys or ASWD to move around
The red bar shows your life. When it goes to zero you will die.
Eat the green food to fill up your food bar.
When the bar is full, your cell levels up.
You gain additional health or attack power with leveling up.
Watch out, you are not alone in this murky waters.
The blue bar shows your attack strength. By attacking you use up your strength.
You can attack the enemy cells by bumping in to them.
But watch out, red enemies are stronger than you.
